items.sentence: She advised him to go to the hospital, but he didn\'t follow her advice.
Everybody in the car said they wanted to get out and stretch their legs.
If you\'d told us earlier, we\'d\'ve been able to do something about it.
Tom didn\'t want to eat the worms even though they were high in protein.
Tom doesn\'t allow his children to watch more than one hour of TV a day.
